page.title: 04THE SCHOOL FETE
page.content: At 2.00pm on June the 15th 1985 we had our annual school fete.We had a handicraft stall selling soft toys that we had made in the past weeks,and some soft toys that had been made and given to us to be sold.There were a lot of other stalls some were {plant {stalls,jumble,toy stalls,cake stalls,a {treasure hunt }and many other stalls. During the course of the fete there were {Gymnastic Displays,the school {orchestra }and a {Recorder group.}Also there were fun races for everyone, including the parents.At 5.00pm it was {The Grand Draw.}First prize was a { {Black and White Television,}second prize was a{Cassette Recorder,}third prize was {Two Railway Tickets}and there were about 15 other prizes as well.After the fete we counted up all the money we had made and it came to about Â£25.00.
